title: The Rock
creator_credit: World Mirror and British Information Services
brief_description: A travelogue of Gibraltar. The atmosphere of cosmopolitan bustle in the busy streets and cafes; the holidaymakers on the sunlit beaches; the mixed uniforms of soldiers, sailors and airmen stationed at “Gib”; the famous Barbary Apes; the Ceremony of the Keys in the fortress.
